Krupp's Bracers

miscellaneous (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 366
armor id [armor]: 78 (Krupp's Bracers)
protection, body [protbody]: 4
protection, head [prothead]: 4
defence [def]: +4
reinvigoration [reinvigoration]: 3

Requires 10E to forge (E2)

These magical steel bracers were specially made for the warlord Krupp. The bracers not only increase the defense of their wearer and the strength of his armor, but they also reinvigorate him so that he can fight for a very long time without tiring.
